document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">Pompless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Life </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">pass </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">lowliest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">career </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">same </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">pageant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">wends </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">way </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">exalted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">here </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">cordial </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">mystery </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">Hospitable </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">Pall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">way </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">beckons </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">spaciously </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">miracle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Pompless no life can pass away
